body:
So yeah, today I've got a problem.
Some of nebula players are rushers, and they get the same problem.
Out of blocks.
So my suggestion Is adding blocks to nebula shop.
32 logs- 8 points
64 logs- 12 points
Thank you!
Post what do you think about this suggestion below.
body_tagged:

title: [Suggestion] More blocks.

+infinity
